Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory801.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Want to do this challenge with me?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wanshi glances briefly at the rules on the card and looks at you.'}
{2: "I thought you'd be the perfect person to do this with...", 3: '7', 4: "You're definitely the perfect candidate.", 5: '7'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "So that's how you see me? I'm a little hurt.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Ah, no, that's not what I meant...", 3: '10'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Haha, alright, not gonna tease you anymore.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "You don't need to explain yourself when you ask me for anything.", 4: '1'}
{2: "So... let's do this?", 3: '14'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Yes, as you wish.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'And so begins "Wrong Answers Only".', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Once the game begins, all participants have to answer everything said to them with irrelevant answers within the specified time limit.'}
{3: "It's not actually that bad. If no one starts a conversation with me, there's no risk..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier A', 3: "Huh? Aren't you two the Gray Raven Commandant and Wanshi from Strike Hawk?", 4: '1'}
{3: '...You realize there is no avoiding familiar faces at a festival as lively as this one.'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier A', 3: 'What brings you two here together? Is there some secret joint mission between Gray Raven and Strike Hawk?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: '【kuroname】 said they had a hard time sleeping because their pillow was too hard.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wanshi replies calmly.'}
{2: "Hmm... green pillowcases look pretty nice, don't they?", 3: '28'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier A', 3: "Pillows? That doesn't sound like a mission. Guess that means you two are here to get a new pillow, then?", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Construct Soldier A', 3: 'Ahh, I see what it is. People always like to say, "You\'ve got to make yourself sharp before making your weapon sharp," and I bet that\'s what you\'re doing, right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier A', 3: 'You have my respect for trying to apply that philosophy in life, Chief!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: "C'mon, Commandant, you've got to teach me a thing or two here.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier A', 3: 'So where are you headed now, to a shop?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Breakfast was bad today and I barely ate anything.', 3: '38'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: "I can't believe you dumped the food I'd made you into compost...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Right after Wanshi finishes speaking, the Construct soldier seems curious for a moment and soon gives you a look as if he has figured everything out. He then continues.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier A', 3: "Oh boy, but thank God it's lunchtime now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier A', 3: "And I bet you're starving now since you barely ate anything this morning, Commandant?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier A', 3: 'But it sure is difficult to follow you guys... I mean, your conversations sure are pretty damn deep.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier A', 3: "But that's not gonna stump me! See how I've been managing to keep up with you guys? Hehe, pretty impressive, right?", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "I heard this path has been under maintenance recently. There's a lot of debris sitting around, which made it much narrower than before. Now it can only fit two people walking side by side.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'We do get overwhelming crowds of people here during holidays. We should just consider hanging out at the dorm next time.', 3: '50'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier A', 3: "Really? I haven't heard anything. But it is indeed packed here today with all these people around.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier A', 3: "Well, let's not stop blocking the road, then.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier A', 3: 'And I thought you were ready for lunch, 【kuroname】? My friend runs a restaurant nearby. How about I join you both—Ah!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Before the Construct finishes speaking, he's forcibly dragged away by another Construct soldier."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier B', 3: "You really are terrible at taking hints, aren't you?", 5: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier A', 3: 'What are you doing?! I was just trying to get myself acquainted with...', 5: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier B', 3: "Give me a break here, for God's sake! Can't you see they want you gone like ASAP?", 5: '2'}
{3: "...You would have told them to tone it down if it weren't for the game."}
{3: 'With a barely perceptible smile playing across his face, Wanshi watches as the talkative Construct gets dragged away.'}
{2: "...You're pretty sure they're gonna end up with some very askew impression of you by the end of the day.", 3: '64'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'That thing about breakfast—was it true, or did you just make it up?', 4: '1'}
{3: "With it, you realize what Wanshi is talking about, and you figure that he probably isn't breaking the rule here... since it's been a while now since you said whatever you said about breakfast."}
{2: 'I certainly never said anything about finding the pillow uncomfortable.', 3: '69'}
{3: "Seeing that you didn't fall for it, Wasnhi takes your hand without saying anything."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Ah well, it doesn't really matter if it was true.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Let's try to find you a proper restaurant now, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I was just fooling around when I said...', 3: '75'}
{3: 'Wanshi shushes you.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Don't forget the rule.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'We could go to a restaurant, or we could find you a comfortable pillow alternatively...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Either way, it needs to be somewhere without interruptions. Just you and me, alone together.', 4: '1'}
